p: GHG emissions from livestock products were calculated using the approach of Herrero et al. (2013) which provides data on GHG emissions from enteric fermentation and manure management for several animal groups (i.e. ruminants, small ruminants, pigs and poultry) using data for India on livestock systems and feed. National GHG emissions were calculated based on the average body weight of the livestock for different regions. Additional emissions for feed production were calculated using the CFT for feed crops.
